credits-20210002:
Composer & Arranger: Moto, D.Yi
Vocalist: Kinoko蘑菇
Lyricist: Mira.Z
Produce: Vanguard Sound
credits-20210003:
The previous definition has been blurred
All the past is like a long river
With you we silently stood on the bank
Who would have thought it?
Being caught in the whirlpool of tragedy
credits-20210004:
Shading into numbness my fear
I’m on the verge of losing my mind
The flame of war lit up the lifeless sky
It’s so beautiful
Have I seen the light before?
credits-20210005:
Look back on history
Countries set up and split
People gather and leave
The tree leaves fall
Then claims new green
So, I believe in someday
credits-20210006:
Tenderly twilight will come
The shining stars tell the end
No matter I’m in heaven or hell
Always I hear the voice hidden in the wind
Never bend your knees or lower your head
Is this my destiny?
credits-20210007:
Still holding bravery? My friend
Or crouching in the dark without a cry
Come, look up the sky
Do you see the lemon moon?
I can see meanwhile
We will meet again soon, it’s true
credits-20210008:
Tenderly twilight will come
The shining stars tell
The end
No matter I’m in heaven or hell
Always I hear the voice hidden in the wind
Never bend your knees or lower your head
credits-20210009:
Beneath the birch
Rustling sigh
Fuzzy memory is polished
credits-20210010:
Tenderly twilight will come
The shining stars tell the end
No matter I’m in heaven or hell
Always I hear the voice hidden in the wind
Never bend your knees or lower your head
This is my destiny

보컬 Vocalist：Kinoko_蘑菇

credits-20220003:
I climb over and over mountains
I cross over and over visions
That is gonna make it all the way 
To the last intrusion
credits-20220004:
It's a Bill you really have to pay
Until the day you go down on knees
My old friend, what else do you wanna say
credits-20220005:
A sweet song spellbound
A lullaby of wounds
The only thing I did wrong was I've waited so long
credits-20220006:
Spinning my fate around
Sealing my brain off
Never doubt what the truth is all about
credits-20220007:
Awake from long dream
Sieged by solar sea
No way under endless ray to run free
credits-20220008:
Let the shadow retrieve
The ending comes to where it should be
Be aware
What you see is not what you achieve
credits-20220009:
I read again and again your words
My memory turns breathed and stirred
That is gonna make it all the way
To the last disillusion
credits-20220010:
It's a dish you really have to taste
Until the day no more hatred
My old friend, wish you a lovely journey
credits-20220011:
Fell in separation
Longing for reunion
This time my God please bring me navigation
credits-20220012:
A crack of the dawn
Leading me to the front
Through the throng I truly found the world
credits-20220013:
Awake from long dream
Sieged by solar sea
No way under endless ray to run free
credits-20220014:
Let the shadow retrieve
The ending comes to where it should be
Be aware
What you see is not what you achieve
credits-20220015:
Awake from long dream
Sieged by solar sea
No way under endless ray to run free
credits-20220016:
Let the shadow retrieve
The ending comes to where it should be
Be aware

credits-20220103:
-  황혼 사이로 미래의 꽃은 먼저 피어나고  -
-  긴 죽음의 터널에서 기차는 빠져나가네  -
credits-20220104:
-  누가 표값을 낼지    또 누가 잘잘못을 가를지  -
-  우린 괜찮아    괜찮을 거야  -
credits-20220105:
-  종소리는 울려 오한을 부르고   -
-  기적은 떨리는 소리로 울리니  -
credits-20220106:
-  강철의 뱀이 차가운 철로 위를 미끄러져  -
-  장막 너머 이야기의 끝으로  -
credits-20220107:
-  우리는 총으로 소네트를 쓸 수 있을까?  -
-  탄창은 뱉어지고 또 물려지겠지  -
credits-20220108:
-  우리의 운명처럼 코드로 새로이 써서  -
-  좋은 설정 속에서 살아가  -
credits-20220109:
-  황혼 사이로 미래의 꽃은 먼저 피어나고  -
-  긴 죽음의 터널에서 기차는 빠져나가네  -
credits-20220110:
-  누가 표값을 낼지    또 누가 잘잘못을 가를지  -
-  우린 괜찮아    괜찮을 거야  -
credits-20220111:
-  차륜은 톱니바퀴들처럼 맞물려  -
-  잠재된 고통으로부터 심장을 자유로이 하고   -
credits-20220112:
-  시대를 따라 낯선 도시로 향하며  -
-  우리는 골칫거리를 집어삼키기만 하네   -
credits-20220113:
-  폭탄이 폭죽처럼 밤을 밝힐 수 있을까?  -
-  벽의 핏자국은 색이 바래져 가는데  -
credits-20220114:
-  중독적인 유령의 메아리와 뒤엉켜 싸우며  -
-  고요한 세상으로 돌아가  -
credits-20220115:
-  황혼 사이로 미래의 꽃은 먼저 피어나고  -
-  긴 죽음의 터널에서 기차는 빠져나가네  -
credits-20220116:
-  누가 표값을 낼지    또 누가 잘잘못을 가를지  -
-  우린 괜찮아    괜찮을 거야  -
credits-20220117:
-  대륙을 넘나드는 이야기는 끝나지 않아  -
-  하늘의 비가 창처럼 내리꽂히는데  -
credits-20220118:
-  선견지명도 결과론도 우린 믿지 않아  -
-  기차가 멈추면 그저 작별 인사할 뿐이야  -

credits-20230003: - Through love and fate With joy and pain -
credits-20230004: - We never say goodbye Until we have no choice -
credits-20230005: - For places we’ve been For times we’ve shared -
credits-20230006: - We raise a glass of smiles and tears Cheer for friendship -
credits-20230007: - Born in black and white Hopes hide out of sight God of fortune is miserly, right?
credits-20230008: - When rain batters from sky Piercing eyes with sighs -
credits-20230009: - The oath was drained by Death sufficed -
credits-20230010: - Wine on me, let’s drink the taste of fate Loneliness, best flavour for warriors -
credits-20230011: - Be nameless, be weightless Survived on the only aim -
credits-20230012: - The sparks in my heart Burnt all paths I found Growing to an old wound -
credits-20230013: - I heard what howling wolves are proud of Iron and blood -

credits-20230015: - When the definition fails No more fairy tales -
credits-20230016: - A princess is a holy knight Heads are tails -
